step_feedback.feedback: Good job stretching your arms overhead and opening your fingers. Keep this position for the next step.
You're doing well with stretching your arms overhead. Ensure your fingers remain open as you prepare for the next movement.
Focus on making a tight fist and squeezing your shoulder blades together as you push down. Remember to inhale and tighten your muscles during this phase.
Great job stretching your arms back overhead and exhaling. Continue to relax your muscles as you return to the starting position.
You've completed the repetitions. Ensure you are consistently making a tight fist and squeezing your shoulder blades together during the push-down phase.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your fingers open when stretching overhead and make a tight fist while squeezing your shoulder blades together as you push down. Continue practicing these movements.
